title: Stocks hover near record as Nvidia gains on AI licensing deal
description: U.S. stocks wavered near a record high in thin holiday trading, as yields on 10-year Treasuries bounced and investors shifted attention toward commodities. Nvidia Corp. climbed as analysts viewed a licensing deal with artificial intelligence startup Groq positively. The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq 100 were both trading little changed at 12:32 p.m. in New York. Among S&P 500 sectors, materials and ...

title: AI videos have flooded social media. No one was ready
description: Fake videos created by artificial intelligence are fooling people on social media. These deceptive clips are spreading rapidly, raising alarms about a new wave of disinformation. While platforms have policies, they are struggling to keep up with the technology. Experts say companies need to do more to label AI content and moderate it effectively.

title: Think layoffs are bad now? Executives warn millions of jobs could be axed in 2026
description: Many companies may cut jobs in 2026 as they use more artificial intelligence. A new survey shows big firms are planning layoffs, especially in marketing roles. Unemployment is already high, and hiring is slowing. Some CEOs warn workers to learn AI skills, while others say AI will mostly change tasks, not replace jobs.

description: Nvidia, the maker of artificial intelligence chips and the world’s most valuable public company, agreed to license the technology of chip startup Groq and hire its top executives.
